verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* every one that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

For thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* of thine \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*: \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add*, and \add it shall be\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* with thee.

Thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add shall be\add* as a \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* by the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* like \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w plants|strong="H8363"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thy \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.
Behold, that thus shall the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: and thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2898"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.
Yea, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w childrenâ€™s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add and\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
